properties.sent-le-init-bal: The overall sent amount does not exceed the initial deposit.
properties.reveal-timeout-after-commit: `reveal` and `timeout` can only be called after `commit`.
properties.timeout-deadline: If `timeout` is called, then at least 1000 blocks have passed since the contract was deployed.
properties.commit-auth-owner: If `commit` is called, then the sender must be the owner.
properties.reveal-auth-owner: If `reveal` is called, then the sender must be the owner.
